Counselling Services Management API bill¶

class csm.bill.AbstractBill[source]¶

Abstract Bill class that defines the method amount() for Bill and BillProxy to define

class csm.bill.Bill(bill_amount, patient_ID)[source]¶

The Bill class that contains all attributes of the bill such as bill_ID, amount due etc

class csm.bill.BillProxy(bill)[source]¶

The BillProxy class that implements the authentication to check if the incomming request has the right access to the requested Bill object

Counselling Services Management API constants¶

Counselling Services Management API counsellor¶

class csm.counsellor.Counsellor(counsellor_name)[source]¶

Class that implements feature the concellor performs

prescribe_medicines(patient_name, medicines_)[source]¶

This method is used to prescribe medicide for the patient. It uses object composition to get prescription objects :param patient_name: Name of the patient :type patient_name: str :param medicines_: List of medicines specified by the counsellor :type medicines_: ste :return: Prescription object with relevant details

schedule¶
Returns:List of slots for appointments for each counsellor

remove_bill()[source]¶

Once the bill has been paid the bill be removed from outstanding bills and added to paid bills :return: None

class csm.prescription.PrescriptionFactory[source]¶

Prescription factory that generates Prescription objects if not created. If created returns the copy of that object

Prescription Protoype abstract class This class defines the clone abstract method that classes inherit must implement
